archimate:Deliverable.name: Hierarchical Entity Relationship Model
archimate:Deliverable.documentation: Enterprise data model for each of the entities. Hierarchical or layered diagrams provide different levels of granualarity depending on purpose The most abstract level , level 1 has no relationship. It out lines key entitiy classes and subtypes. Lower level diagrams to visualise the relationships between those data items. Assuming four levels, Level 1 - Level 4 Expect to have to use views of limited set of entities to demonstrate behaviour to specific audiences.
